channel.title: How to play moparscape on a mac "Detailed"
channel.description:
First of all check if you're software is up to date by clicking the apple icon and hitting "Software Update".
Second of all if you did not download the client [u][url=http://cache.moparisthebest.com/MoparScape.zip]here it is.[/url][/u]
If it works on the first try GOOD FOR YOU :) ( you can type in the IP and the default port 43594)
If not follow these steps. 1.Goto spotlight you can do it by pressing command and "space" you will see this
[img]http://ploader.net/files/deccce44688a04aae771d16f418e3f79.png[/img] Search Java Preferences. 2.Now do exactly what i do for it and check all the boxes i checked.[img]http://ploader.net/files/62d4d2edbc93d36626a51b9320976ece.png[/img]
[img]http://ploader.net/files/0f2a64c9a94866ac68597dd45fe283bc.png[/img]
[img]http://ploader.net/files/eb1ab90f231f8b495c8d9fc8f78a8b99.png[/img]
[img]http://ploader.net/files/af12f5cde63f3069c7bede5b6ec9b9ed.png[/img]
[img]http://ploader.net/files/631e1883147b7cefef59f99f0f3e37c9.png[/img]
3. Now close the window and load moparscape and you will see this :D.
[img]http://ploader.net/files/e993bf5f31ecb265980990859ebffb8d.png[/img] Now play and enjoy :).
P.S what is my username in non leet language?

@Pure_season wrote:

First of all check if you’re software is up to date by clicking the apple icon and hitting “Software Update”.

Second of all if you did not download the client here it is.

If it works on the first try GOOD FOR YOU ( you can type in the IP and the default port 43594)

If not follow these steps.
1.Goto spotlight you can do it by pressing command and “space” you will see this

Search Java Preferences.
2.Now do exactly what i do for it and check all the boxes i checked.

  1. Now close the window and load moparscape and you will see this :D.


Now play and enjoy :).
